name: credential
content:
credentials [ plural ]
Add to word list
Add to word list
the abilities and experience that make someone suitable for a particular job or activity, or proof of someone's abilities and experience: All the candidates had excellent academic credentials.
See more
[ C ] a piece of information that is sent from one computer to another to check that a user is who they claim to be or to allow someone to see information
